contents.sentence: Were automatic slope and grade controls used as outlined in the QCP?
To enable the paver to place the asphalt course at the proper profile and cross slope

a. Confirm that the automatic slope and grade controls were used unless specified in the QCP. Normally automatic controls are required unless existing grades at roadway intersections or a drainage structure must be met or if paving shoulders, temporary detours, behind curbs, or in other areas where its use is impractical as determined by the Engineer

.
b. Notify the PEMS when the corresponding check points are not met by the Contractor.
